plot outline: The plot revolves around two parallel stories in the film, of which the first involves ACP Shreya and ACP Rishikesh who are married for long, but at the moment are on the brink of a divorce and live separately. The second story has Arjun, a student who loves his bike and is a bike mechanic. The duo ACP lead the investigation into the theft of bikes which take place in Kochi metro.
title: Entry
